subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: Federer, 33, is playing as well as he did at his peak, but in Sunday’s final he will face Djokovic, who is currently in his prime as the No. 1-ranked player in the world.
snippet: Federer, 33, is playing as well as he did at his peak, but in Sunday’s final he will face Djokovic, who is currently in his prime as the No. 1-ranked player in the world.
